item.title: 泰雷兹、Radiall 和福克斯康恩探讨在法国建立半导体组装厂
item.description: 法国防务集团泰雷兹、连接器制造商 Radiall 和台湾富士康周一表示，已开始就在法国建立半导体组装和测试工厂进行初步谈判。【原文：French defence group Thales , connector maker Radiall and Taiwan's FoxConn have begun preliminary talks to establish a semiconductor assembly and test facility in France, they said on Monday.】

item.title: 穆迪下调美国主权信用评级，美股期货下滑
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货下跌，而国债收益率则在评级机构穆迪将美国主权评级下调一档后上涨，从而引发了人们对美国债务膨胀的担忧。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Monday, while Treasury yields rose after ratings agency Moody's downgraded the country's sovereign rating by one notch, bringing forward concerns around the ballooning U.S. debt.】

item.title: 雪铁龙任命 Xavier Chardon 为首席执行官
item.description: 雪铁龙品牌所有者 Stellantis 周一表示，雪铁龙已任命 Xavier Chardon 为新任首席执行官。【原文：Citroen has appointed Xavier Chardon as its new CEO, the brand's owner Stellantis said on Monday.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克初创公司 InoBat 推出军用无人机电池
item.description: 斯洛伐克初创公司 InoBat 周一表示，该公司计划推出一款专为军用无人机和无人驾驶航空系统设计的电池，以应对欧洲国防开支的激增。【原文：Slovak startup InoBat plans to launch a battery designed for military drones and unmanned aerial systems, it said on Monday, as it responds to an upsurge in European defence spending.】

item.title: 穆迪下调评级后，中国要求美国维护国际金融体系稳定
item.description: 中国周一呼吁美国采取负责任的政策措施，维护国际金融和经济体系的稳定，保障投资者的利益。【原文：China on Monday called on the United States to take responsible policy measures to maintain the stability of the international financial and economic system and safeguard the interests of investors.】

item.title: 政府称英国法律援助网络攻击窃取了个人数据
item.description: 英国法律援助机构报告了一起网络攻击事件，该机构称，有一个组织访问并下载了自 2010 年以来以数字方式申请法律援助的人的 "大量 "个人数据。【原文：Britain's Legal Aid Agency reported a cyber attack which it said had resulted in a group accessing and downloading a "significant" amount of personal data from those who digitally applied for legal aid since 2010.】

item.title: 独家报道越南文件显示，特朗普组织正在探讨在胡志明市建造大厦的计划
item.description: 路透社看到的一份越南政府文件显示，特朗普组织和当地合作伙伴正在探讨在越南商业中心胡志明市建造摩天大楼的计划，埃里克-特朗普预计将于本周到访。【原文：The Trump Organization and a local partner are exploring plans to build a skyscraper in Vietnam's business hub of Ho Chi Minh City, with Eric Trump expected to visit this week, a Vietnamese government document seen by Reuters shows.】

item.title: Revolut 计划在法国扩张 11 亿美元，并将申请银行牌照
item.description: 英国金融公司 Revolut 周一表示，该公司计划在未来三年内投资 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）用于扩大在法国的业务，并将很快申请法国银行牌照。【原文：British finance company Revolut said on Monday it plans to invest 1 billion euros ($1.1 billion) over the next three years on expanding in France and will soon apply for a French banking licence.】

item.title: 西班牙消费者权益部封杀 65,000 多份 Airbnb 假日出租信息
item.description: 西班牙消费者权益部周一表示，已命令 Airbnb 从其平台上撤下 65,000 多条假日出租信息，称这些信息违反了现行规定。【原文：Spain's consumer rights ministry said on Monday it had ordered Airbnb to withdraw more than 65,000 listings for holiday rentals from its platform, saying they violated existing rules.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧准备应对 1.5 亿美元的关税打击，推出 5 亿美元的节约计划
item.description: 世界顶级烈酒生产商帝亚吉欧周一预测，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税将给该公司带来每年 1.5 亿美元的损失，并启动了一项 5 亿美元的成本节约计划。【原文：Diageo , the world's top spirits maker, on Monday forecast a $150 million annual hit from U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, and launched a $500 million cost-savings programme.】

item.title: 英伟达™（Nvidia®）公司黄仁勋在台湾受到人工智能英雄的欢迎，引发 "Jensanity "热潮
item.description: 人工智能领域的宠儿 Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋在台湾无论走到哪里，他的粉丝和兴奋的记者们都会紧随其后，盯着他的一言一行，伸出手臂恳求他在书籍、海报甚至棒球上签名。【原文：Wherever AI darling Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang goes in Taiwan, his adoring fans and excited reporters follow, hanging on his every word, arms outstretched as they beseech him to sign books, posters and even baseballs.】

item.title: 美国墨西哥湾沿岸首个液化天然气船舶燃料加注中心获得开工许可
item.description: 美国墨西哥湾沿岸首个液化天然气船用燃料设施的合资项目已获得最终许可，预计今年晚些时候将开始施工。【原文：A joint venture project developing the first marine fuel facility for liquefied natural gas in the U.S. Gulf Coast has secured final permits and construction is expected to begin later this year, executives involved said on Monday.】

item.title: 英伟达软件旨在创建人工智能计算能力市场
item.description: Nvidia 周一宣布了一个新的软件平台，该平台将为基于云的人工智能芯片创建一个市场。【原文：Nvidia announced a new software platform on Monday that will create a marketplace for cloud-based artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空公司净利润增长 28%，达到创纪录的 21 亿美元
item.description: 卡塔尔航空公司周一发布的初步声明显示，该公司年度净利润猛增 28%，达到创纪录的 78 亿卡塔尔里亚尔（约合 21 亿美元）。【原文：Qatar Airways posted a 28% jump in annual net profit to a record 7.8 billion Qatari riyals ($2.1 billion), according to a preliminary statement issued by the airline on Monday.】

item.title: 高通公司将生产可连接英伟达芯片的数据中心处理器
item.description: 高通公司（Qualcomm）周一表示，它将生产定制的数据中心中央处理器（CPU），这些CPU将使用英伟达（Nvidia）的技术与英伟达的人工智能芯片相连接。【原文：Qualcomm on Monday said it will make custom data center central processing units, or CPUs, that use technology from Nvidia to connect to Nvidia's artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: Telegram 创始人称法国要求他禁止罗马尼亚保守派声音
item.description: Telegram 消息应用程序创始人帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）说，他拒绝了法国情报部门负责人提出的在罗马尼亚大选前禁止罗马尼亚保守派声音的要求。【原文：The founder of the Telegram messaging app, Pavel Durov, said he refused a request by the head of France's intelligence service to ban Romanian conservative voices ahead of the country's elections.】

item.title: 瑞安航空年度利润因票价下跌而下降 16%，但夏季需求强劲
item.description: 瑞安航空公司周一报告称，由于平均票价疲软，其年度利润下降了16%，但这家欧洲最大的低成本航空公司表示，即将到来的夏季需求强劲，票价略有上涨。【原文：Ryanair reported a 16% fall in its annual profit on Monday due to weaker average fares, but Europe's largest low-cost carrier said that demand for the coming summer was strong and that fares were modestly higher.】

item.title: 那么，中国应该多消费，美国应该少消费？
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole】

item.title: 创始人称小米将在芯片设计领域投资至少 69 亿美元
item.description: 中国智能手机和电动汽车制造商小米公司创始人雷军周一在社交媒体平台微博上发文称，小米计划从2021年起，在至少10年内投资至少500亿元人民币（约合69.3亿美元）用于芯片设计。【原文：Chinese smartphone and electric vehicle maker Xiaomi plans to invest at least 50 billion yuan ($6.93 billion) in chip design over at least 10 years starting from 2021, its founder Lei Jun said on Monday in a post on social media platform Weibo.】

item.title: 中国 4 月份工厂产出和零售额增长放缓
item.description: 短期的休战和特朗普难以预测的态度继续给中国以出口为导向的经济蒙上阴影，在现有关税基础上，中国仍将面临 30% 的关税。【原文：A short-term truce and Trump's unpredictable approach continue to cast a shadow over China's export-driven economy, which still faces 30% tariffs on top of existing duties.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Nvidia 正在就投资 PsiQuantum 事宜进行深入谈判
item.description: 据 The Information 周日报道，英伟达（Nvidia）正在与量子计算初创公司 PsiQuantum 就投资事宜进行深入谈判。【原文：Nvidia is in advanced talks to invest in quantum computing startup PsiQuantum, The Information reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 贝森特：如果各国不 "真诚 "谈判，特朗普将实施关税威胁
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周日在接受电视采访时表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统将按照他上个月威胁的税率，对那些不以 "诚意 "就交易进行谈判的贸易伙伴征收关税。【原文：President Donald Trump will impose tariffs at the rate he threatened last month on trading partners that do not negotiate in "good faith" on deals, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said in television interviews on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国 4 月工业产出和零售销售增长放缓
item.description: 周一的官方数据显示，中国 4 月份工业产值同比增长 6.1%，较 3 月份的 7.7% 有所放缓。【原文：China's industrial output in April grew 6.1% from a year earlier, slowing from 7.7% growth in March, official data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 日本央行副行长：如果通胀率有望达到 2%，日本央行将继续加息
item.description: 日本央行副行长内田伸一周一表示，如果经济增长重新加速，基本通胀率有望达到2%的目标，央行将继续加息。【原文：Bank of Japan Deputy Governor Shinichi Uchida said on Monday the central bank will continue to raise interest rates if economic growth re-accelerates and underlying inflation is on track to hit its 2% target.】

item.title: 中国 4 月新房价格持平，近两年未见增长
item.description: 周一的官方数据显示，中国 4 月份新房价格连续第二个月环比持平，表明尽管政策制定者努力稳定房地产行业，但下行压力依然存在。【原文：China's new home prices were unchanged in April from a month earlier for a second month, official data showed on Monday, signalling persistent downward pressure despite policymakers' efforts to stabilise the sector.】

item.title: 投资者关注伊美会谈和中国数据，石油价格变化不大
item.description: 周一，油价变化不大，投资者在关注伊朗-美国核谈判的结果和中国将公布的关键经济数据，以评估与美国的贸易紧张局势对中国商品需求的影响。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Monday with investors eyeing the outcome of Iran-U.S. nuclear talks and key economic data due from China to assess the impact on its commodities demand following trade tensions with the United States.】

item.title: 微软希望人工智能 "代理 "能协同工作并记住事物
item.description: 微软首席技术专家在周日举行的微软年度软件开发者大会前表示，微软设想未来任何公司的人工智能代理都能与其他公司的代理合作，并能更好地记忆他们之间的互动。【原文：Microsoft envisions a future where any company's artificial intelligence agents can work together with agents from other firms and have better memories of their interactions, its chief technologist said on Sunday ahead of the company's annual software developer conference.】

item.title: 华尔街期货和美元在信贷打击后有所松动
item.description: 周一，华尔街股票期货随美元下滑，国债收益率上升，穆迪下调美国信用评级凸显了人们对美国经济政策反复无常的担忧。【原文：Wall Street share futures slipped with the dollar on Monday and Treasury yields rose as concerns about erratic U.S. economic policies were underlined by Moody's downgrade of the country's credit rating.】

item.title: 关税引发抛售，三星 SDI 将新股定价下调 17
item.description: 美国可能加征关税的担忧引发大盘抛售，三星 SDI 股价下跌，该公司周一将新股发行定价下调了 17%。【原文：Samsung SDI on Monday slashed the pricing of its new share issue by 17% after its stock declined in a broad market sell-off sparked by concerns over potential U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 美国信用评级下调后美元走低，澳元在澳大利亚央行会议前收窄跌幅
item.description: 由于市场消化了美国政府信用评级被意外下调的消息，而且挥之不去的贸易摩擦也对市场情绪造成了影响，美元在亚洲早盘缩减了四周以来的涨幅。【原文：The U.S. dollar trimmed a four-week gain in early Asian trade as markets digested a surprise downgrade of the U.S. government's credit rating and as lingering trade frictions weighed on sentiment.】
